Title: Lord-Relictor
Legend: Clad in sinister Mortis armour, the Lord-Relictors are grim soul-priests and mighty warriors both. For all their dour appearance, each is a true hero, their prayers channelling Sigmar’s power to be unleashed upon the battlefield.
Intro: A Lord-Relictor is armed with a Relic Hammer.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Lords of the Exemplar Chamber • Lords of the Harbinger Chamber • Lords of the Warrior Chamber

Rules.Name: Mortis Priest
Rules.Fluff: Though all mortals chosen by the God-King demonstrate their martial strength, those selected to become Lord-Relictors possess a rare wisdom that sets them apart.
Rules.Rule: Add 1 to chanting rolls for this unit.

Rules.Name: Healing Storm
Rules.Fluff: A Lord-Relictor can call down cleansing bolts from the sky, invigorating their allies with the power of the storm and closing even the most grievous wounds.
Rules.Rule: Healing Storm is a prayer that has an answer value of 4 and a range of 12". If answered, pick 1 friendly STORMCAST ETERNALS unit wholly within range and visible to the chanter. Heal up to D3 wounds allocated to that unit.

Rules.Name: Lightning Storm
Rules.Fluff: Lord-Relictors can pray to Sigmar to bless the battlefield with a spear of blinding lightning.
Rules.Rule: Lightning Storm is a prayer that has an answer value of 4 and a range of 12". If answered, pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the chanter. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. In addition, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by that unit until your next hero phase.
